quote: Always remember, your focus determines your reality.
author: George Lucas

quote: I don't focus on what I'm up against. I focus on my goals and I try to ignore the rest.
author: Venus Williams

quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: The secret of change is to focus all of your energy, not on fighting the old, but on building the new.
author: Socrates

quote: Our focus is our future and what we focus on will multiply in our life.
author: David DeNotaris

quote: Focus on the possibilities for success, not on the potential for failure.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: The secret of change is to focus all of your energy, not on fighting the old, but on building the new.
author: Socrates
